events.message: Hello, I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund for the purchase as soon as possible.
The customer's issue has been categorized under Refund due to their request for money back following a wrong item delivered.
Support agent Jane Smith has been assigned to handle the refund request for the customer's order.
Hi, this is Jane from customer support. I understand you received the wrong item and want a refund. I am here to help you with that.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item received so we can verify and process your refund promptly?
Sure, my order number is 54321 and I have attached a clear photo showing the item I received instead of what I ordered.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate your refund immediately and you should see the money back on your card within 5 to 7 business days.
Thanks for the quick response and solution. I appreciate the prompt help and look forward to the refund.
The refund process has been completed on our end. Please allow 5 to 7 business days for the amount to reflect in your account.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received the refund successfully and if there is anything else we can assist you with.
Yes, the refund arrived today. Thank you for your help and excellent support throughout the process.
We are happy to hear that everything has been resolved. Closing this case now, thank you for contacting customer support.
